data.title: Robert Taylor Actor
data.meta_description: Posts about Franchot Tone written by giraffe44
data.text:
The Gorgeous Hussy, 1936, is playing on Turner Classic Movies on Wednesday, March 15 at 1:30 a.m. est. It’s a story about Washington D.C. It’s about dirty tricks, sleazy operatives, scurrilous personal attacks and lies. The 2020 election? No, The … Continue reading →

Flight Command 1940 Flight Command is playing on Turner Classic Movies on Friday. January 6, at 11:15 a.m. This is the film that got Robert Taylor hooked on flying. Mr. Taylor started taking flying lessons right away. His devotion to … Continue reading →

Three Comrades, 1938, is playing on Turner Classic Movies on Tuesday, October 18 at 900 a.m. est. New York Times Review (summary): Based on a novel by Erich Maria Remarque, Three Comrades represented one of the few successful screenwriting efforts of … Continue reading →
